definitions: to visit (a place, such as a tourist spot)
in the end (used in a question)
as far as sth. is concerned
when all is said and done
there's not enough time (to do something)
(used for 啊 after words ending with a, e, i, o, or ü)
final particle expressing doubt or surprise
(of students) prepare a lesson before class
take job applications for a job
(mw for mountains, bridges, tall buildings, etc.)
